_xResult.title: Deal with It Midi Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made midi skirt with green sequins
_xResult.longdesc:
You and this skirt are one in the same, being naturally beautiful and effortlessly drawing people’s attention towards yourselves. This made to measure skirt is perfect for parties, cocktail hours, or get togethers any time you want to dazzle. The deep dark green hue makes it fitting for festive events around the holidays.

You need a skirt made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
